feed.title: NeoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content: Add ability to scrape Spotify without API key

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.5.4
entry.content: • return 302 instead of item content when fetching item via API

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.5.6
entry.content:
• show verification email sending status
  • Support for bibliotek.dk and eReolen.dk (The Danish libraries) by @pmakholm
  • add manifest.json
  • fix Bluesky posting issues
  • tmdb: ignore title fallback

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.5.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • change the schema for request from http to https for google books cover image urls by @luxaeternati in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/999
  • fix/catalog: bgm website ( #933) by @j1g5awi in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/1002
  • fixed: new comment shown as Edited but with no history in Mastodon
  • fixed: updated comment were not accepted by Mastodon in some cases
  • fixed: Bluesky login info was not saved properly when user update login session

New Contributors

  • @luxaeternati made their first contribution in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/999

Full Changelog: https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/compare/0.11.5.6...0.11.5.7
